days.title: Day 1 Prayer
days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

Heavenly Father, Thou adorned Queen Margaret of Scotland with virtue and with great love for the poor. 
Her speech was salted with wisdom, her silent thoughts were virtuous and holy, her whole life a pattern of virtue.
Lend Thy ear to the intercessions of this holy woman and help us to live after her example, and especially for the grace we ask (mention you request here…) so that Thy goodness and mercy becomes visible in today’s world.
Through our Lord Jesus Christ, your Son, who lives and reigns with Thee in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, for ever and ever. Amen.

Concluding Prayer

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be  Saint Margaret of Scotland, Pray for us
